title: Morgan Thorn
body: Morgan Thorn (Communications Officer)    Position: Communications Officer  Pronouns: They/Them  Age: 37  Background: Western Europe  Specialization: Information Systems and Signal Processing    Crew Profile  Professional Summary:  Morgan Thorn is an expert in signal theory and advanced communication networks, tasked with maintaining and optimizing Olympus' internal and external communications. Thorn’s work has consistently been exceptional, though their insistence on secrecy and secure protocols has occasionally caused friction within the crew.  Psychological Evaluation:  Traits: Exceptional focus and obsessive dedication to their craft. Prone to mistrust and secrecy.    Notable Behaviors: Withdrawn tendencies, reclusive work habits, and sharp wit.    Challenges: Tendency to overcomplicate problems and strained relationships due to perceived secrecy.    Physical Description:Tall and lean, standing at approximately 6ft 1in. Thorn has short, meticulously cropped dark hair and sharp, angular features. They wear glasses with slim, rectangular frames, enhancing their precise, intellectual demeanor. Their preference for muted, professional attire—often gray or navy jumpsuits—matches their methodical personality. Thorn’s posture is upright and formal, with an air of deliberate control in their movements.

title: Contrato n22
body: Sector: X11.  Objective: Investigate the sewers and report only to me.  Reward: 22 MCr.

title: wtf are you kidding me?
body: Are you kidding me? Why don't you change your password?  The system is entirely compromised until you correct it.  You're the sysadmin, if you're this dumb the corporation is at risk.
